summary: Diff includes significant changes beyond a frontend-only Version 29 Live publish workflow, including backend canister code modifications and apparent new/expanded frontend functionality and documentation/scripts. Key REQ-4/REQ-5 acceptance evidence is incomplete or not present in the diff summary (e.g., exact deploy command and proof of completed smoke test).

missing_requirements.requirement: Publish workflow blocks immediately if frontend/VERSION is not exactly '29'.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows new/updated enforcement scripts, but does not show the actual content of frontend/VERSION or any change confirming it contains exactly '29'. The requirement explicitly constrains that file content, and the diff summary does not include it.

missing_requirements.requirement: The publish workflow deploys only the frontend canister to the IC network using `dfx deploy frontend --network ic` and does not deploy/reinstall the backend canister.
missing_requirements.reason: frontend/scripts/publish-live.sh is truncated before the actual deployment command is shown, so the diff summary does not provide evidence that it runs exactly `dfx deploy frontend --network ic` (and only that).

missing_requirements.requirement: After publishing, complete the manual Live smoke test checklist for Version 29 and capture any failures per frontend/docs/live-smoke-test-v29.md.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff adds/updates the checklist and a report template, but provides no filled-out results/report demonstrating the smoke test was actually completed against the Live URL with pass/fail outcomes and captured issues.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister code changes were made despite the requirement/constraint that the Live publish must be frontend-only and must not deploy/modify/reinstall the backend canister or its state.
hallucinated_features.reason: The diff explicitly modifies backend/main.mo, which constitutes backend code modification and violates the 'frontend-only' constraint for this publish task.

hallucinated_features.description: Added new/expanded frontend application functionality unrelated to publishing Version 29 (e.g., new route /purchase-confirmation/$orderId, enhanced media rendering, KYC/checkout behaviors, animations).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals prohibit adding new application features unrelated to publishing Version 29 to Live; the diff summary (via frontend-file-summaries.txt) describes multiple functional enhancements beyond a publish workflow.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced new helper tooling and documentation artifacts (smoke test helper script, smoke test report template, expanded publish docs) that were not explicitly requested as deliverables.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-4/REQ-5 focus on executing an existing publish script and completing a manual checklist; the diff includes new supporting files/scripts/templates not requested by the BuildRequest.
